basics.name: Luca Di Marco
basics.label: Frontend dev @ WeDevelop | Shaping tomorrow with today's code
basics.summary: Made my first website at 9 years old, I'm extremely creative and work tirelessly to achieve my goals. Currently skilled developer in TypeScript, Astro, Next, CSS/Tailwind and React. Constantly learning and believing that tomorrow is always better.
